Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Grade 3 - 4 neutropenia and thrombocytopenia were documented in four and three patients ( 17 and 13 % ) , respectively , but drug dose reduction due to cytopenia was not required in any case .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| Grade 3 - 4 neutropenia |
| Grade 3 thrombocytopenia |

These entities are not strictly "chemical" entities, but they are specific medical conditions related to the levels of neutrophils (neutropenia) and platelets (thrombocytopenia) in the blood.
